attributes.action: Give me an £80,000.00 a year wage because I like it.
attributes.additional_details:
This is not a parody or satire petition. I am not trying to make a clever comentary on the out of control wages for MPs, I just want 80k.

Thank you.
attributes.background: Each year expenses go up more, and I need 80k so I can keep drinking champagne.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because your salary is the responsibility of your employer and not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
